ComicInfo.Summary:
BEYOND THE SAVAGE BORDER!
CONAN finds himself beyond the Black River, surrounded by the warlike PICTS! But the tribesmen may be the least of his worries if he cannot fight his way through the demonic beasts slithering around the forest! The epic return of the mighty Conan continues...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Esad Ribic | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Chris Bachalo & Tim Townsend | 3 | Var | Variant Cover | Emanuela Lupacchino & Rachelle Rosenberg | 4 | Var | Variant Cover | Mark Brooks | 5 | Var | Variant Cover | John Tyler Christopher | 6 | 2nd | Second Printing Variant Cover | Mahmud A. Asrar | 2 | Note: Includes a novella back-up, Black Starlight Part 2 of 12, written by John C. Hocking.
